      public Set<ObjectiveCard> getCandidateObjectives (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname) throws PlayerInitException
      Get the candidate objectives of the player with the given nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player to get the candidate objectives of
      Returns:
      a Set of the ids of the candidate objectives of the player, empty if the cards have not been dealt yet
      Throws:
      PlayerInitException - if the player with the given nickname is not present

    • getCandidateObjectiveByID

      public ObjectiveCard getCandidateObjectiveByID (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname, int id) throws PlayerInitException, IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException
      Get the ObjectiveCard class instance of the candidate objective with the given id of the player with the given nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player to get the candidate objective of
      id - the id of the candidate objective to get
      Returns:
      the ObjectiveCard with the given id of the player with the given nickname
      Throws:
      PlayerInitException - if the player with the given nickname is not present
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - if the objective with the given id is not one of the candidate objectives of the player

    • getCurrentAction

      public TurnAction getCurrentAction()
      During a turn, the player first has to place a card on the field; then they have to draw one from the ones in the table. This method returns the action that the player has to do in the current turn
      Returns:
      the action that the player has to do in the current turn

      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player to associate the starter card to
      starter - the starter card to associate to the player
      Throws:
      PlayerInitException - if the player with the given nickname is not present
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - if the player has already chosen a starter card

    • addPlayerToTable

      public void addPlayerToTable (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname, @NotNull @NotNull PlayerColor colour) throws PlayerInitException, NumOfPlayersException
      The Method used when adding a new player to the game, it will add the player to the list of players and to the queue of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      colour - the color of the player
      Throws:
      PlayerInitException - if the nickname is already in use or the colour is already in use
      NumOfPlayersException - if the maximum number of players has been reached

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer (String nickname)
      The Method used when removing a player from the game, it will remove the player from the list of players and from the queue of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player to remove

    • chooseFirstPlayer

      public void chooseFirstPlayer()
      Method used to set the starting player of the game, it will choose a random player from the list. The player will be set as the first player and the current player.

    • isFirstTheCurrent

      public boolean isFirstTheCurrent()
      Return if the starting player is the current player, a true also means that a new round has started
      Returns:
      true if the starting player is the current player, false otherwise

    • goNextTurn

      public void goNextTurn()
      Method used to continue the game to the next turn, it will put the current player at the end of the queue and, the next player as the current player and remove it from the front of the queue.

    • resetAll

      public void resetAll()
      Method used to reset the PlayerManager to the initial state, it will clear all the players hand and field.

    • areStarterSet

      public boolean areStarterSet()
      Used to check if all players have set their starter card, by set it means that they chose to place it on the field on the front or on the retro
      Returns:
      true if all players have set their starter card, false otherwise

    • areObjectiveSet

      public boolean areObjectiveSet()
      Returns:
      true if all players have set their candidate objectives, false otherwise

      public boolean isTurnOf (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname)
      Check if the player with the given nickname is the one currently playing
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player to check
      Returns:
      true if it's the turn of the player with the given nickname, false otherwise

      public int getNumberOfConnected()

      the number of players that are currently connected

      public void hardReset()
